## Project Description
VS Code extension that detects checkbox patterns (like `# [CB]:0|1`) in text files and renders them as interactive checkboxes using editor decorations.

## How to Use
1. Press F5 to launch the extension in debug mode
2. Open any file and add a checkbox pattern: `# [CB]:0|1`
3. The pattern will be replaced with a visual checkbox (☐ or ☑)
4. Use Cmd+Shift+C (Mac) or Ctrl+Shift+C (Windows/Linux) to toggle checkbox state
